name: Mondstadt
startIntroPart2: Oh Jean may you lead your People into times of freedom like our great ancestor Vanessa once did. Show the world that only through freedom a Nation can thrive.
declaringWar: We will make sure to put an end to your tyranny!
attacked: May the Anemo Archon protect us.
defeated: What a tradgedy to see our Nation fall. But you won´t extinguish the wind!
introduction: Greetings! Take a seat. We hope for a fair partnership that will aid our people.
neutralNo: Its not in the Interest of our people.
hateNo: We are not agreeing on that!
hateYes: That is good enough for us.
afterPeace: The people will celebrate this peace.
tradeRequest: We hope this trade is to your likings.
uniques: Free [Great Artist] appears <upon discovering [Drama and Poetry] technology>

name: Liyue
startIntroPart2: May your wise words and carefull transactions bring this Nation to great phrosperity
declaringWar: The resources whould do the world more good in our hands!
defeated: Very well you Barbarian. Sign here and we shall be yours.
introduction: With a few contracts we shall strengthen our bond.
neutralNo: We cannot agree to those Terms.
We will look for a better opportunity.
neutralYes: That is a very good opportunity.
hateHello: Do you belong im these halls?
hateNo: We are not agreeing on that!
hateYes: I thought you could not think of that.
afterPeace: This should cut costs and workforce.
tradeRequest: Only a fool whould ignore this.

name: Inazuma
startIntroPart1: We shall follow the Almighty Narukami into greatness!
startIntroPart2: May your lightning protect us from our enemies and let your abilities grow this Nation!
declaringWar: For the evil you brought to this world you shall be struck by our lightning!
attacked: You are a fool to think you can even set foot on inazumian Soil!
defeated: How could this have happened? How can Eternity end?
introduction: Hello, I hope this meeting goes well.
hateHello: Do you wish for my wrath?
hateYes: It´s not like it whould hurt our eternity.
tradeRequest: Let us start a shipment, yes?

name: Sumeru
startIntroPart2: We are deeply sorry for your year long emprisonment. We hope that your Knowlege will bring us into an bright and wonderfull future under your rule.
declaringWar: This is not good but necessary.
attacked: I hope we can forgive you one day...
defeated: You can burn our books and demolish our houses but our seeking of knowlege can never be surpressed!
introduction: Good morning may I fetch you a tea?
neutralNo: We will look for a better opportunity.
neutralYes: This should go into finance study books!
That is a very good opportunity.
hateNo: We are not agreeing on that!
You could not come up with anything better?
hateYes: I guess it whould be dumb to say no.
I think I have to agree.
tradeRequest: This offer will improve our wealth.
uniques: Free [Great Scientist] appears per [1] social policies adopted

name: Fontaine
startIntroPart1: Furina de Fontain lead our Nation through Justice and we shall grow unstoppable!
startIntroPart2: Oh Furina great Archon the World seeks your greatness, so step onto the stage and show us the way to greatness!
declaringWar: It is time to enter the dilemma! Be prepared for war!
attacked: This is not how it is supposed to go! How dare you flip the script!
defeated: Oh how unexpected this Denoument was... But I guess the curtains are closed now.
introduction: Greetings. Be welcomed to our nation. But don´t go agaist the law because I wont stop my judgement even at other Leaders!
neutralNo: Its not in the Interest of our people.
hateHello: Are you supposed to be here?
hateLetsHearIt: Go on. I don´t have mutch time.
hateNo: We are not agreeing on that!
tradeRequest: We hope this trade is to your likings.

name: Natlan
startIntroPart1: Oh great Mavuika. You have awoken once more to help us to make this nation great and find ways out of our misery
startIntroPart2: We hope that the times can turn to the better under your rule.
declaringWar: To save this nation we will have to destroy you!
attacked: We will do everything to protect us from you!.
defeated: With Natlans fall the world can only fall to the Abyss.
introduction: Let us work together, shall we?
neutralNo: We cannot agree to those Terms.
neutralYes: That is a very good opportunity.
hateHello: Do you think you can just barge in?
hateNo: We are not agreeing on that!
tradeRequest: I think these terms are good.
uniques: Gain a free [Follower] belief <upon discovering [Civil Service] technology>
May buy [Melee] units with [faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost

name: Snezhnaya
startIntroPart1: Great Tsaritsa lead our nation and industries!
startIntroPart2: We will dominate the world in all ways thanks to your awesome rule. We will follow you at all times!
declaringWar: Don´t try to stand in our way.
attacked: You think you can defeat the Fatui? Pathetic!
introduction: Hello, I hope this meeting goes well.
neutralNo: This is not in our Interest.
hateHello: Do you wish to be executed?
hateNo: What is in it for us?
hateYes: Well this is of use for us.
uniques: [+30]% Production when constructing [Melee] units [in all cities]
Free [Great General] appears per [1] social policies adopted

name: Kingdom of Deshret
startIntroPart1: Almighty king Deshret we will follow you until the end of time!
startIntroPart2: We hope your endless discovories of technologie and your constant seek of knowledge will lead us to unreachable greatness!
declaringWar: You stand in our way, little one
attacked: How dare you challenge me King deshret? Be prepared for humiliation!
defeated: How could our nation have fallen? Where we not careful enough?
introduction: Hello are you interested in a chat? Feast your eyes on my monuments!
neutralNo: We will look for a better opportunity.
neutralYes: That is a very good opportunity.
hateNo: We are not agreeing on that!
You could not come up with anything better?
hateYes: I guess it whould be dumb to say no.
